channel.title: Dance Overview on Learnosity
channel.description: Recent content in Dance Overview on Learnosity

item.title: Learn To Dance
item.description: The Learn to Dance lessons demonstrate the most famous dance styles including: Ballroom & Latin, Hip Hop, Salsa, Ballet, Club Dancing, Tap Dance, Freestyle Dance, Breakdancing, Irish Step Dancing, Line Dancing, Country Western, Argentine Tango, Belly Dancing The three ballroom dances taught are the waltz, rumba, and swing. The instructors say that these three dances fit 95% of the songs you will hear at any social dance event. Well catered to the beginner audience and help them build confidence to master the basics of ballroom dance.
